WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Please, for this type of question, open a «Discussion» instead of an «Issue».
Anyway, you can read the C:\Windows\temp\CustomUpdateEngine.log to search for any error message.
WorkItem.Description:

Comments.Message: This http://wsus.de/uninstall2install works for me every time a new Java Version is available.

Yes, it should work. For me it was easyier to create a new solution, then troubleshoot the old one. ;)
hah, i'm not stupid, it just doesn't work =)
